page.title: 21Manchester Bolton & Bury Canal
page.content:
The restoration of the canal was announced in 2002 by British Waterways. The Manchester Bolton & Bury Canal Society has been active in keeping the towpath open for walkers and cyclists. The canal is still in water from Little Lever to Bury, blocked only by the lowered Water Street Bridge in Radcliffe.
Contribution by: Paul Hindle
